patch 8.2.1929: MS-Windows: problem loading Perl 5.32

Problem:    MS-Windows: problem loading Perl 5.32.
Solution:   Define NO_THREAD_SAFE_LOCALE. (Ken Takata, closes #7234)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1929: MS-Windows: problem loading Perl 5.32 · vim/vim@0289065
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1929: MS-Windows: problem loading Perl 5.32 · vim/vim@0289065
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: problem loading Perl 5.32. Solution: Define NO_THREAD_SAFE_LOCALE. (Ken Takata, closes #7234)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cd030c4b604bea92311e9c418aefe5143dee9201|patch 8.2.1928: Vim9: "silent!" not effective when list index is wrong>
patch 8.2.1928: Vim9: "silent!" not effective when list index is wrong

Problem:    Vim9: "silent!" not effective when list index is wrong.
Solution:   Ignore list indes failure when emsg_silent is set. (closes #7232)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1928: Vim9: "silent!" not effective when list index is wrong · vim/vim@cd030c4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1928: Vim9: "silent!" not effective when list index is wrong · vim/vim@cd030c4
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: "silent!" not effective when list index is wrong. Solution: Ignore list indes failure when emsg_silent is set. (closes #7232)

patch 8.2.1927: Vim9: get unknown error with an error in a timer function

Problem:    Vim9: get unknown error with an error in a timer function.
Solution:   Use did_emsg instead of called_emsg. (closes #7231)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1927: Vim9: get unknown error with an error in a timer func… · vim/vim@d66960b

attachments.text: …tion Problem: Vim9: get unknown error with an error in a timer function. Solution: Use did_emsg instead of called_emsg. (closes #7231)

patch 8.2.1926: cannot use a space in 'spellfile'

Problem:    Cannot use a space in 'spellfile'. (Filipe Brandenburger)
Solution:   Permit using a space. (closes #7230)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/086fc9a585afa4317046fa0a36c7b896286e5128|patch 8.2.1924: Vim9: crash when indexing dict with NULL key>
patch 8.2.1924: Vim9: crash when indexing dict with NULL key

Problem:    Vim9: crash when indexing dict with NULL key.
Solution:   Use empty string instead of NULL. (closes #7229)  Make error
            message more useful for empty string.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1924: Vim9: crash when indexing dict with NULL key · vim/vim@086fc9a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1924: Vim9: crash when indexing dict with NULL key · vim/vim@086fc9a
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when indexing dict with NULL key. Solution: Use empty string instead of NULL. (closes #7229) Make error message more useful for empty string.
